info.title: Joint Venture
info.description: The service contains Joint Venture, Description, Equity Group, Equity Type, and Equity Share nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload, which is used in creating or updating a joint venture, including appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations. If there are any issues when the joint venture is created or updated, the system displays error messages in the response. The service does not allow deletion of any of joint ventures, descriptions, equity group, equity type or equity share.

x-sap-shortText: Maintain joint ventures using this inbound service
